price: 196.Nabiyow koroositeh yan mari edde yanin temqoo kee usun kabxâ faydah guranah Baaxok Baaxo Aban gexo koo duquuruse waytay.
arabic: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhīna kafarū fī al-bilādi
